title: Potential Energy Calculator | Physics Tool for Gravitational and Elastic Energy

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Near-surface gravity: \( U = m \cdot g \cdot h \) Two-body gravity: \( U = -\,\dfrac{G\,m_1\,m_2}{r} \) Ideal spring: \( U = \tfrac{1}{2}\,k\,x^2 \)
